translation: Deluded by these Natures, composed of the three qualities of Nature, all this world does not know Me as distinct from them and immutable.
commentary: 7.13 three by three? Gunamayaiá¸¥ composed of Gunas? by natures? by these by these? Everything all? This is this? Jagat world? fascinated deluded? Not not? recognizes knows? Maam Me? from these from them? But higher? Avyayam immutable.Commentary Persons of this world are deluded by the three alities of Nature or Maya. Affection? attachment and infatuated love are all modifications of these alities. On account of delusion
